attributes.action: make it illegal for bailiffs to enter debtors homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the year 2008 and we must stop the personal possessions of debtors being taken from their homes. The resale value of the second hand goods is normally so very low and the loss is disastrous for the debtor. We must wake up and stop acting in this criminally backward and uncivilised manner, and stop bailiffs entering debtors homes. It is so easy, in this modern world, to deduct money from bank accounts and benefits.
